titles.title: Keep the William J. Hughes Technical Center Funded for FY 2020 Act
To make continuing appropriations for the Federal Aviation Administration for fiscal year 2020.
Keep the William J. Hughes Technical Center Funded for FY 2020 Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary:
Keep the William J. Hughes Technical Center Funded for FY 2020 Act
This bill provides continuing appropriations to the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) for FY2020 if a joint resolution making continuing appropriations for FY2020 is not in effect. In the event of a government shutdown due to a lapse in appropriations, the bill provides continuing appropriations to the FAA at the same level that was provided for FY2018.
